column4: how can I configure ubutnu 10.10 to except and display syslog from other servers in its messages file?

ages ago i saw an artical by  the 'linux journal' or 'linux gazette' magazine that covered that topic. tey even showed how to do it with a 'server' that had no actual ip (some how) so the hackers couldent even see/access the 'syslog server' :)  but that was a few years back i read that.
well 10.10 uses rsyslog now, and I can't find anything on that
yep. that may be totally differnt.
